original_text: Babylonia's towns will become heaps of stones. The land will be dry and empty, like a desert. Nobody will live there any more. Nobody will even travel through the land. Babylonia's towns will become heaps of stones. The land will be dry and empty, like a desert. Nobody will live there any more. Nobody will even travel through the land. Babylonia's towns will become heaps of stones. The land will be dry and empty, like a desert. Nobody will live there any more. Nobody will even travel through the land. Babylonia's towns will become heaps of stones. The land will be dry and empty, like a desert. Nobody will live there any more. Nobody will even travel through the land. Babylonia's towns will become heaps of stones.
korean_text: 그 성읍들은 황폐하여 마른 땅과 사막과 사람이 살지 않는 땅이 되었으니 그리로 지나가는 사람이 없도다

sentences.original_text: Babylonia's towns will become heaps of stones
The land will be dry and empty
like a desert
Nobody will live there any more
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그곳에 더 살지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Nobody will even travel through the land
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그 땅을 지나가지 않을 것입니다
